name: Point It
description:
Point It is a Seattle-based digital marketing agency that specializes in Search Engine Marketing, SEO, Display, Social Advertising and Analytics. We are a dynamic group of individuals that strive to be an integral part of our client's marketing teams.
For each of the past three years, Point It was recognized by the Puget Sound Business Journal as one of Washingtonâ€™s top 100 fastest growing private companies and as one of the Inc 5000 fastest growing private companies in America!
